name: Hyper-Generic 90s Neon GridMographᵀᴹ RED🟥
description:
[27-06-‎18]
This is my interpretation of the ever seen 3d wireframe grid horizon layout using Trapcode TAO & After Effects as imagined by the great Kidmograph who, as everyone knows, was the first to invent 3d wire neon grids. (This is a tribute to him as he's been a constant inspiration for a long time, not only in art but in the defense of creative property, he'll automatically receive an edition of this token before anyone else.)

[02-10-‎18]
Posting it on giphy
https://giphy.com/gifs/space-matrix-off-the-grid-fLy7DvMOQvdrhxR6Zl
507,571 Views (on mint day)

[13-02-19]
4K 16:9 available on VJLoops.com
RED : https://www.vjloops.com/stock-video/retro-eighties-basic-grid-red-landscape-horizon-01-136280.html

GREEN : https://www.vjloops.com/stock-video/retro-eighties-basic-grid-green-landscape-horizon-01-136278.html

BLUE:https://www.vjloops.com/stock-video/retro-eighties-basic-grid-blue-landscape-horizon-01-136277.html

PURPLE: https://www.vjloops.com/stock-video/retro-eighties-basic-grid-purple-landscape-horizon-01-136279.html

[01-10-21]
Rendering a new version with the VFX optical glow
1:1 | 1080x1080 | 10 Frames | 0.03 frames per seconds

In honor of Kidmograph, maximum royalties 25% is set on this token. 
remember to make sure you don't get remunerated less than what you deserve for your craft !
